DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether incidence emergence delirium reduce end-tidal concentration sevoflurane decrease .
DOC.brief_title: Post Extubation Delirium End-tidal Sevoflurane Concentration
DOC.detailed_description: Sevoflurane induction maintenance select . Intubation perform lidocaine spray vocal cord . After , effective caudal brachial plexus block perform . End-tidal concentration sevoflurane maintain 2.5 % . Spontaneous respiratory maintain . Sevoflurane stop end surgery . Patients randomly assign 2 group : high concentration group ( Group HC , end-tidal concentration sevoflurane extubating > =0.5 % ) low concentration group ( Group LC , end-tidal concentration sevoflurane extubating < 0.5 % ) . Patients Group LC extubated cough purposeful movement appear . The patient whose end-tidal concentration sevoflurane > = 0.5 % exclude . Patients Group HC extubated criterion meet : 1.the patient cough purposeful movement appear 2.end-tidal concentration sevoflurane decrease 0.5 % . A trained nurse ( blind group ) record PAEDs score PACU .
DOC.criteria: Age 27 year ASA I II Estimated surgery time < 2 hour Sevoflurane induction maintenance along caudal block Axillary Block Craniofacial anomaly Difficult exposure vocal cordS Obesity Asthma Invalid caudal block axillary block
